website_summaries.verdict: A simple and inexpensive lamp that makes it easy to turn off your light when you are ready to go to sleep.
pros: Hangs over your head on the top of the headboard
Attaches easily with no tools needed
Good value for a nice-looking lamp
cons: This model works best if you have a headboard high enough over your head to make the height comfortable for lighting
It cannot be mounted on the wall

customer_reviews.title: Bright light, functional, not too fancy.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. Very useful. Not for low headboards--12 inch drop. 60 watt light is great for reading or knitting in bed. Update: fragile! Shade broke when the pillow hit it.
customer_reviews.author: J Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I am usually leery about ordering products like this online, but due to time constraints on a project, decided to go for it. I was relieved and pleased when it arrived (very quickly, by the way) and looked exactly as pictured. Works great, looks good...yay!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Handy Headboard Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Wanted extra night stand space, so I replaced lamps with this one for the headboard. It's not fancy, gold cord that I hide behind a slat, not expensive either, does the trick. Cream color, you can see cord shadow through the shade. It doesn't bother me :-)
customer_reviews.author: Shar

customer_reviews.title: extra light for bed reading
customer_reviews.text: This is a real help to get some light where you need it -in bed when reading. It does not however fit or hang on a iron open bedframe -so you have to be creative-- -if you have something that is not a solid wood head board then it won't hang there.
customer_reviews.author: D.Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for. I was concerned ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. I was concerned that lamp socket might not be solid for the pull chain, but it was solid as a rock. I used a 40W Cree warm white LED bulb in mine, and that was plenty bright. Buys be space for my clock radio on bedside table, as I can now move the big lamp I had sitting there to read in bed. You DO need a high enough headboard, but mine was tall enough in the center at the peak height. Bottom of the shade hangs down 7" from the top of the headboard, so keep this in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Randal D. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap, made in China
customer_reviews.text: It is my mistake did not check the dimension of the lamp and did not read 1 stars reviews as I usually do. Lamp very small with allowable 60 Watt or less bulb and there is a reason Because very small. When I put a 100W bulb it is almost touching shade of the lamp.I needed for reading in bed. Not for light go to the bathroom during the night. This lamp exactly for that. Unwillingly I left thinking to change fabric and lining to make it more pretty for eyes and not sore in the eyes as it is. Made in China it is enough to say about quality Extremely overpriced Has to be under $10
customer_reviews.author: Wisdom everywhere

customer_reviews.title: Always wanted one!!!
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted a headboard lamp, but thought I had to use screws/nails etc. So I was so excited when I discovered this. I think my husband wants one for his side of the bed now. I'll probably be a return customer because I received it quickly, was reasonably priced and I love it. This lamp can be used just about anywhere. 60 watts are a little too bright for me and 40 watts are very bright. Just love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, something so simple and not really all that attractive has brought me such joy. I love my headboard lamp, now I can read and then when sleepy, just reach up and pull that chain and then darkness. It's perfect!!! The only thing that concerns me is it gets really hot, in a really short time and the headboard is very hot to the touch. It's a leather headboard so I wonder over time if it will leave a mark or darkening. That would not be pleasing to me, so still trying to figure out how to place a barrier between the two.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Love

customer_reviews.title: Convenient & Decorative
customer_reviews.text: I love this over the headboard light! After my hip replacement surgery I wanted to have the best sense of comfort to minimize my getting ou/in bed. My nightstand is not next to my bed, and often I’m not ready to turn off the light, so this is perfect and fits with my decor. It takes a 60 watt bulb and that is bright, I plan to try 25 or 40. It said it fits 2” headbands buy mine is 2-1/2”. So it make it fit I had the bend a little bit and to secure it I duck taped the anchors, and now it is secure. The metal is very strong, well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephaney

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - broke easily I bought this lamp for ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality - broke easily I bought this lamp for a bed in the guess bed room. It was rarely used until last week, when someone pull the string to turn on the lamp, the string/switch was stuck at the on position that could not be turned off. I have many lamps using pull-string methods to turn it on and off. This is the first lamp that I have the problem, and it is more expensive than other lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Cat

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea. Too bad it doesn't work on most headboards.
customer_reviews.text: The lamp itself is a great design, since it is flat on one side so it can lay flat against a bed headboard. But as another reviewer pointed out, your headboard needs to be very high in order for the lamp to be elevated above your head while reading. As pictured, the lamp hangs several inches below the hooks which are draped over the top of the headboard, so on a standard-sized headboard (one high enough to allow your pillows to be placed upright for reclining), the bottom of the lamp falls below one's head and into the pillows, rendering it useless. Cute lamp, good price, needs more work on design.
customer_reviews.author: ccsteveTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: headboard lamp
customer_reviews.text: I removed two wall lamps and replaced them with this light. This light is simple, easy to turn off while in bed and gives adequate light. I remembered lights like this from the 1950's and was glad to find they were still around, no doubt because they are so practical.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: On/off pull chain mechanism broke after approximately 10 uses
customer_reviews.text: The pull chain mechanism broke after slight use. The bulb end connector falls out of it’s attaching piece with one pull of on/off chain. Bought in 2017. Broke after 10 or so uses. Bought for guest area in >200 year old home where outlets are scarce, I thought I had found a solution but I guess not at just under $2.80 a pull to turn it off and on.
customer_reviews.author: scottierazor

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice lamp and a great idea. But I can't use it until I make some adjustments. The power cord is quite short, it might need an extension cord if you have a tall headboard. The attachment hooks are also short, so if you have a padded headboard you might have to think how to make it fit. I am not sure yet how to make it work myself. I tried to bent them differently but they are just too short. Maybe I will add some wire to it to make it stay.
customer_reviews.author: kiki

customer_reviews.title: How to read in bed without disturbing your partner
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is perfect for a person like me who has never had a night without reading in bed. The light is direct and doesn't disturb my husband. The lamp is pretty, although I know from my last one - identical to this - that the shade is a little fragile, so I'll be careful not to bump it accidentally. Overall, a great buy. The package arrived exactly when it was promised, and the packaging was perfect to protect the product. I would use this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Martha M

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bed light
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed light. It fits right on the headboard and creates a soft glow that is easy to ready by. It has adjustable "arms" that one can utilize to find the best fit for your headboard. The electric cord fits nicely over the back of the headboard and out of sight and the on/off cord is easily reachable. I hate glaring lights, or lights that get knocked over on the nightstand, so this was perfect for me. I liked it so well, I bought for two bedrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Idagirl

customer_reviews.title: I love these lamps!
customer_reviews.text: These are great lamps, and do exactly what I wanted. They seem little to me (on a king size headboard, anyway.) The hooks are covered so they don't scratch up the headboard, you can place them anywhere you want, they're easy to put on and take off and, with the hanging chain, easy to turn on and off. The chain isn't annoying, either. I have 60W bulbs in now (all I had), which are perfectly fine, or use a lower watt for a softer light. I highly recommend these lamps!
customer_reviews.author: D. Millwood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for reading in bed
customer_reviews.text: So glad to have found this lamp. couldn’t get th right amount of lighting for reading in bed. This little lamp meets all my needs. Add a small 40 watt bulb, hang it on the headboard and you get a soft cozy light to read by. Nice sturdy ‘hooks’ to hang over the headboard and a regular lampshade. Pull chain. Conveniently you can turn it around if you prefer not to see the lamp during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Scroggins

customer_reviews.title: Good value for over headboard reading lamp.
customer_reviews.text: It is nostalgic of days everyone wanted a reading lamp over headboard of their bed. I hoped quality would be good and I wasn't disappointed. It is beautiful, the magic touch to complete the charm I was hoping for in my guest bedroom and the price was reasonable. If you can curve your hand to cup the top of your headboard the curved hanger of this lamp should be a good fit. It uses 60 watt bulb, equivalent or less, which is perfect for reading in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer a reader

customer_reviews.title: Needs just a touch more work.
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, even with a very low wattage bulb in this thing, the light coming out the bottom is way, way too bright. It really needs that 'shade' material to cover the bottom as well, given its intended mounting point (a headboard). I cobbled together something out of some fake leather material I got for a different project, but it would look tons better if it were the same material as the rest of the shade. Otherwise, solidly built and functional.
customer_reviews.author: MLT

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 2 uses.
customer_reviews.text: Sooo disappointed. I enjoy reading in bed for about 30 minutes before going to sleep. I had a shoulder injury so this would have been so much easier than reaching for a lamp.After the first 2 times that I used it, it quit working. Now, it may turn on every 10th time that I pull the chain. I will be returning in- WRONG! I waited a day past the 30 days. Now, I have a non- functioning light! Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Great reading lamp
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for an easy bedside lamp for my young son who likes to stay up and read at night before bed. This is perfect! He doesnt even have to move to turn the light off. The wire hanger is easily bendable to fit any headboard. We love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Tori Miller

customer_reviews.title: Way overpriced
customer_reviews.text: My main complaint is Price vs. Quality. The first thing I noticed was the leaflet inside saying Made In China, which I quickly confirmed by looking at the cheap quality of the fixture and pull-chain. This lamp is small and fragile. Just trying to remove the protective plastic could result in damage, so be careful. Whoever is selling this item is making a Killer Profit and should be ashamed, but I digress. I'll use the lamp until the cheap pull-cord breaks which is typical even for high-quality lamps, so I'm crossing my fingers here.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Convenient lamp but it isn't the highest quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the convenience this little overhead lamp offers; however, I have bought it in the past, and the little chain that turns it on and off has worn out faster than I expected. The socket seems a bit flimsy. I don't expect it to last a long time, but I've purchased it again because it's convenient and I wanted one immediately. Next time, I'll probably invest in having a higher quality lamp installed on the wall! Not bad, but not great. Not many options out there for this particular style of lamp.
customer_reviews.author: DreamerKW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cozy reading
customer_reviews.text: This headboard lamp is just what I needed for snuggling down to read myself to sleep. The pleated fabric that covers the shade makes the light source bright but not glaring and a 60 watt bulb furnishes the perfect amount of light to illumine not spotlight. That I have a brass bed headboard is slightly problematic, since the plastic covered hooks that secure it were designed for the wooden headboard pictured but placing it at the end of the headboard rather than the middle works just fine. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Measure headboard  accurately before purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as described. Make sure you measure your headboard exactly , as the hangars on the lamp are rigid and are not flexible . I gave it a 4 star because the lamp is great if you read lying flat in bed, however if you read elevated,it doesn't through off as much light. My headboard is not really tall enoug to get the maximum benefit from this lamp. All in all, it is good quality for the money and if it fits your size specifics, you will enjoy it! Jacobs
customer_reviews.author: marilyn jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Works fine.  Fits fine.
customer_reviews.text: I have a sleigh bed, and I was afraid the lamp wouldn't fit on my headboard. It fits and is secure. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Milly

customer_reviews.title: A satisfied customer

I found no uneven gluing or any such as some of the reviewers said they had experienced. I have two 40W bulbs that I interchange. One of my bulbs is a gentle pink and the other is a soft white. :-) Again I am very happy with this product especially for the price that I paid. It came quickly and well packed. I am a satisfied customer
customer_reviews.author: C Grant

customer_reviews.title: My mother loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my mom because she loves to read at night in bed ❤especially her bible and the headboard lamp worked perfectly for her its sturdy it fits on any headboard has a chain so all you have to do to turn of the lamp pull the chain never leaving your bed!!!😁 i highly recommend buying this for you or your love one!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Looks and price.

customer_reviews.title: Great for reading in bed

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This headboard lamp is exactly what I wanted and needed. Just the right size . . . just the right hue of color. Just put the bulb in, adjust it on the headboard. and that's it! If only much of life were just this simple and correct! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Works great easy to use

customer_reviews.title: Tasteful headboard lamp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lamp for reading in bed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect lamp for reading in bed, and I can slide it over to my side of the bed so that it doesn't keep my husband awake. Also, it's much more convenient to reach up and to pull on the chain should I have to get up in the night than it is to reach over to my nightstand in the dark, knocking over things reaching for a table lamp.

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one that I have bought. The first one, years ago. Replace old one because old light bulbs caused cracks in lining on shade. Now with LED light bulbs that won't be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Great Headboard Reading Lamp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, great quality, incredible price!

I love it and our guests love it too. I didn't even know that something like this existed. The quality is great.

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp

customer_reviews.title: Inside lining cracked

customer_reviews.title: Great Reading Light
